start.title: HakuNeko
start.parragraph_01: was made to help users who download media for circumstances that requires offline usage.
start.parragraph_04: get it when you want to read/watch it.
start.parragraph_05: Read the "how to use" documentation at hakuneko.download (link available in the menu)
start.find_site: Find a site to get the content you want to view
start.disclaimer: is not hosting anything. Find a website on the internet that provides the content you want. Then :

tutorial.step_01: Select your connector (the website). Use the filters
tutorial.step_02: Click on the refresh button (can take minutes)

start.help: The connector you are looking for is not in the list ?
start.issue: Create a website request on the github (issue)
start.extra_tutorial: Use the copy/paste feature if you already have the manga link
start.enjoy: You can now download, view, bookmark your favorite mangas

chapters.title: Chapters
chapters.title_download_chapter: Click to download all chapters currently shown in the filtered and sorted list
chapters.title_filter_chapter: Enter a pattern (regex support e.g. '/ch 001/i') to filter the chapter list by their titles
chapters.title_remove_marked: Click to remove the marked chapter
chapters.title_marked_recently_read: The chapter has been marked as "recently read" but is no longer available
chapters.title_remove_recently_read: Remove the "recently read" marker from this chapter
chapters.title_open_folder: Doubleclick to open the folder with your file manager
chapters.avaliable_only_directory: The chapter is only accessable from the manga directory
chapters.remove_download_manager: Click to remove chapter from download manager
chapters.delete_download: Click to delete and re-download chapter
chapters.view_details: Check the exclamation mark in the joblist for details
chapters.new_chapter: new chapter(s) from the current chapter list?

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.remove: Click to remove the selected manga from the bookmark list
bookmarks.add: Click to add the selected manga to the bookmark list
bookmarks.select: Please select a manga to use the bookmark feature

connectors.title: Connectors
connectors.title_connector_pattern: Show only websites with a name that matches the entered pattern (case-insensitive)
connectors.title_manga_pattern:
Show only websites with a manga that matches the entered pattern (case-insensitive)
Searches only in local synchronized manga lists
Press ENTER to perform the search
connectors.show_mangas: Click to show mangas from this website
connectors.title_login_page: Click to open the login page
connectors.title_donation_page: Click to open the donation page
connectors.title_open_website: Click to open the website in a new window
connectors.title_various_taks: This can be useful for various taks e.g.

mangas.title: Mangas
mangas.manga_list_loading: Manga list is loading or empty
mangas.title_manga_paste: Click to paste manga links from the clipboard
mangas.title_select_website: Select a website from which the manga list should be shown
mangas.title_sync_local: Synchronize local manga list with online list from
mangas.title_filter: Enter a pattern (at least 3 characters) to filter the manga list by their titles
mangas.failed_update_manga_list: Failed to update manga list for

menu.title: Menu
menu.title_login_community: Login to the community support channel
menu.title_show_ip: Show your external IP and Geolocation
